Primary Contact: Maria LaBoucan, BSW, Aboriginal Infant Development Coordinator; Phone: 250.868.0351 ext 105; Email: wellness@mcsbc.org
Service Details: - Works in respectful ways to support families, their infants and children through developmental stages- Provides home visits, cultural activities and developmental screening- Focuses on health, intellectual, emotional, physical and spiritual well-being
Eligibility: Ages: 5 year(s) and underInfants to 5 years
Accessibility: Wheelchair Accessible * Parking on Street * Parking Lot access with 1 hour limit
